Text.Text: Ancient traditions bring it that your Jornaleros prefere these mushy green and yellow cooking bananas over the domesticated sweet ones from the shelf. Don't judge them, those poor guys can't know what they are missing!
Soft, fluffy fibre growing on a plant! Could you imagine that we used to run around in cloths made out of sheep wool? Enough of that, get this smooth, white fabric over here, now!

Stinky dried brown leefs, cut to pieces and stuffed into sacks for export. Oh, those poor souls don't know what they are putting their bodys through. It's a treacherous modern addiction and unfortunately they are indulging it in my Restaurant!

Sun-ripenend juicy red and violet grapes. These recent vintages from the New World will delight your pampered Investors' souls! We can just hope, that they'll accept the muddy fouly brewerage we call wine after having tasted this explosion of taste and flavour!
Hacienda Almanac for New World Farms

Overview of the available Old World Hacienda Crop Farms
Overview of the available Hacienda Breweries
Accepts and distributes goods from, and to your production buildings. Provides additional storage space as well.
Increases the efficiency and attractivness of Lumberjack's Huts. Your Lumberjacks will now occasionaly plant luxourius foreign wood types.
"Oh, and one last thing: the tree will fall toward the notch you cut — I would suggest standing somewhere else."
"Oh, and one last thing: the tree will fall toward the notch you cut — I would suggest standing somewhere else."
Drastically reduces the environmental impact of heavy industruies to limit the propability of dretful disasters while maintaining good efficiency.
The safety of your workers, inhabitants and the condition of the surrounding ecosystem is your first priority as a wise Gouvernour.
The safety of your workers, inhabitants and the condition of the surrounding ecosystem is your first priority as a wise Gouvernour.
All Heavy Industries, Mines, Quarries, Chemical Plants and Breweries
Reduced Goods consumption while remaining good productivity for certain industry branches.

The strength of the Hacienda is the local market. In order to strengthen the position of small local buisnesses, Factory Outlets have been introduced. These activities leed to reduced consumption of certain goods, overall higher happiness of your people and therefore higher productivity.

The strength of the Hacienda is the local market. In order to strengthen the position of small local buisnesses, Factory Outlets have been introduced. These activities leed to reduced consumption of certain goods, overall higher happiness of your people and therefore higher productivity.
Support your local craftsmen so that your colony can become an influential wine-growing region.

One day a foreign traveler visiting the vast lands of your hacienda farms brought a bottle of deep purple liquid with him. Amazed by its truly unique flavour, you decide to start an export market with finest, long-matured wine from your own hacienda wine cellars.

One day a foreign traveler visiting the vast lands of your hacienda farms brought a bottle of deep purple liquid with him. Amazed by its truly unique flavour, you decide to start an export market with finest, long-matured wine from your own hacienda wine cellars.
Reduces the amount of modern goods consumed by your inhabitents.
The local assembly decided to ban the resently invented electronic gadgets in order to concentrate on the traditional cultural heritage of the New World.
The local assembly decided to ban the resently invented electronic gadgets in order to concentrate on the traditional cultural heritage of the New World.
All Clothing Factories, All Intermediate Good Producers, Coffee Roaster, Cigar Factory, Scooter Factory and Fan Factory

The strength of the Hacienda is the local market. In order to strengthen the position of small local buisnesses, Factory Outlets have been introduced. These activities leed to reduced consumption of certain goods, overall higher happiness of your people and therefore higher productivity.
Hacienda Border Wall Corner Inwards Left
Hacienda Border Wall Corner Inwards Right

The increasing popularity of your ever growing Hacienda attracted many wine connoisseurs to your Island. The intense flavour of the sunriped grapes combined with a dash of cinnamon produces a unique bouquet. Letting the young wine ripe inside exclusive cherry wood barrels refines its taste even more.
Your residents enjoy the taste of a matured wine from one of your aspiring local Hacienda Wineries.

One day a foreign traveler visiting the vast lands of your hacienda farms brought a bottle of deep purple liquid with him. Amazed by its truly unique flavour, you decide to start an export market with finest, long-matured wine from your own hacienda wine cellars.
A variety of herbs are grown on this farm for their beautiful colours and aromatic scent! A wonderful ingredient to round off any dish! Definitely not to be missed in any kitchen.

Orchids have been mysterious plants since their discovery and first cultivation. Their symmetry, flower and colour variety are highly valued among your Investors! But watch out: Your Investors might get sick with Orchidelirium, where they become unable to control their collector's passion!
<font overrideTextColor="true" color='#f50000'>Disabled while using this Mod Module: True Hacienda Streets</font>
<font overrideTextColor="true" color='#f50000'>Disabled while using this Mod Module: True Hacienda Streets</font>

Unlike tequila, mezcal can be produced from different types of agave, which gives it a wide variety of flavor profiles. Typical of mezcal is its smoky taste, which is created by the traditional baking of the agave hearts in underground earth ovens.
Thanks to its vast, lush grasslands, the Hacienda is the ideal place for large-scale, efficient livestock ranching.
The alpaca is the flagship species of livestock farming in the Andes. Its wool is an integral part of the everyday lives of indigenous people, yet many Europeans still regard it as a luxury product.
Cattle are among the most versatile types of livestock. The extensive, lush pastures of the New World provide ample living space for large herds to develop to their full potential.

The lush savannah biome is the natural habitat of the Nandus, the tallest bird in the New World. Some people apparently have a use for their feathers and leather, but otherwise they are best left alone.
As alpacas do not produce wool fat, sheep are also raised in the Andes for their wool wax. Meanwhile, many of the upper classes enjoy tender lamb as a delicacy.
The goat is often found in the arid regions of the New World, where it is the go-to livestock animal thanks to its low food requirements. Its milk is often used to make strong, delicious cheese.

Keeping bees not only increases production yields on your orchards in the near vicinity, but also ensures that honey and beeswax, which are highly sought-after products in the New World, are readily available on the local market.
Click the button to choice a recipe.
